long_description: The Marin Rift Zone 29er XC6 full-suspension mountain bike is built to tackle any obstacle in your path. It combines big-wheel capabilities with cushy suspension, providing a great ride on any trail. 6061 aluminum frame offers a geometry optimized for XC/trail riding and features a slackened head tube angle. Rock Shox XC32 TK Solo Air 100mm suspension fork features an alloy steerer for weight savings, plus TurnKey lockout and easy access to rebound adjustment. Rock Shox Monarch rear shock features 100mm of air-sprung travel that's easily tuneable and offers rebound adjustment and lockout for maximum pedaling efficiency. SRAM 3 x 10 drivetrain features X5 shifters and X7 derailleurs to give you 30 gears to conquer steep ascents and coast down that blissful singletrack. Shimano M395 hydraulic disc brakes ensure easy work of speed management and offer a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in the back. Schwalbe Rapid Rob tires offer good all-around traction and fast-rolling performance. Specs on the Marin Rift Zone 29er XC6 full-suspension mountain bike are subject to change.
